thread.title: 'Real Housewives' star NeNe Leakes to return to Broadway - KBMT
thread.title_full: 'Real Housewives' star NeNe Leakes to return to Broadway - KBMT - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KBMT
title: 'Real Housewives' star NeNe Leakes to return to Broadway - KBMT
text:
Producers of the long-running hit musical "Chicago" said Thursday that Leakes will play "Mama" Morton in the show at the Ambassador Theatre from Nov. 23 through Dec. 20. It's her first return to Broadway since she made her stage debut last year in the role of Cinderella's wicked stepmother in "Rodgers + Hammerstein's Cinderella."
 KBMT.
